class.name: mesh_layers/BorderLayer
class.description: A border layer, setting the border vertices of a mesh to high costs (dangerous).

class.name: mesh_layers/RoughnessLayer
class.description: A roughness mesh layer, computing the roughness of the surface as cost layer.

class.name: mesh_layers/HeightDiffLayer
class.description: A height differences mesh layer, computing the height differences of the surface as cost layer.

class.name: mesh_layers/InflationLayer
class.description: A inflation mesh layer, computing the inflation of the surface as cost layer.

class.name: mesh_layers/SteepnessLayer
class.description: Calculates the steepness of the surface as a cost layer.

class.name: mesh_layers/RidgeLayer
class.description: Calculates an indicator whether or not a vertex is part of a ridge.
